name: BFF or Die
summary: BFF or Die is a cozy/crazy couch co-op puzzle game for one to four players. As time traveling aliens youâ€™re sent on a risky rescue mission to Earth! Use your gadgets collaboratively to overcome danger and survive as a team.

name: BFDI: Branches
summary: BFDI: Branches is an all-new platformer game with Firey, Leafy, Coiny, and Pin! Featuring multiple characters with varied gameplay, a story mode with branching paths, a complete level editor, and an online level browser!

name: BFDI: Four's Kitchen
summary: Have you ever wondered how it was to cook for Four and X? Now you can experience it in BFDI: Four's Kitchen! In this game you play as Clock and you bake cakes. With two game modes and 30+ different cake combinations you will NEVER be bored in Four and X's kitchen!

name: BFRIS Zero Gravity Fighter Combat
summary: First-person 3D accelerated space fighter combat game, played in enclosed arenas connected by teleports. Real physics down to friction, momentum, and inertia. Six vehicles, 11 weapons/powerups, force feedback, 3-D sound. Network play supports 63 players on a LAN and 24 on 28.8 modems. Release version ships shrinkwrapped with Linux & Windows binaries.

name: BFDIA 5b
summary: An unfinished continuation to BFDIA 5a; the FreeSmarters got trapped inside Evil Leafy and scattered all around her. Help Book pass through lots of tightly designed puzzles in order to reunite with her alliance and escape Evil Leafy!

name: BFGE
summary: BFGE (Bartender Flair Game)-a simulator of the bartender virtuoso.The main character is Flairbartender!!!Flair Bartender-a bartender who will prepare you a cocktail juggling shakers and bottles so that you do not even notice how you will be in front of your drink!
